languages.text: "Прислушайся, матушка. Три клана Четвертого Складочного должны выступать как один. Двое старших решили, дело за тобой. Не проси распустить блюстителей, и оружия не проси, не нужно нам это".

"Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the enforcers or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."
languages.original_text: "Прислушайся, матушка. Три клана Четвертого Складочного должны выступать как один. Двое старших решили, дело за тобой. Не проси распустить блюстителей, и оружия не проси, не нужно нам это".

traits.locale_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the guard or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the guard or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the guard or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the enforcers or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: “听我们说吧，老奶。四号货栈的三个氏族应该团结起来。我们已经做好了决定，现在轮到你来做决定了。不要要求他们解散执法者，也不需要发给我们武器，我们并不需要走到这一步。”
languages.original_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the enforcers or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."

traits.locale_text: “听我们说吧，老奶。四号货栈的三个氏族应该团结起来。我们已经做好了决定，现在轮到你来做决定了。不要要求他们解散镇压者，也不需要发给我们武器，我们并不需要走到这一步。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: «Haznos caso, Yaya. Los tres clanes del depósito 4 tienen que actuar como uno. Nosotros ya nos hemos decidido y ahora te toca a ti. No pidas que se vayan los guardias ni que nos den armas; no necesitamos nada de eso».
languages.original_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the enforcers or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."

traits.locale_text: «Haznos caso, Yaya. Los tres clanes del depósito 4 tienen que actuar como uno. Nosotros ya nos hemos decidido y ahora te toca a ti. No pidas que se vayan los guardias ni que nos den armas; no necesitamos nada de eso».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: 「聞いてくれ、婆さん。第四倉庫のの3氏族は一丸となって行動すべきだ。俺たちは心を決めたんだ、今度はあんたが決める番だ。エンフォーサーを解散させろとか、武器をよこせとか、そんなことは言わないでくれ。そんなもの、俺達には必要ないんだ」
languages.original_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the enforcers or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."

traits.locale_text: 「聞いてくれ、婆さん。第四倉庫のの3氏族は一丸となって行動すべきだ。俺たちは心を決めたんだ、今度はあんたが決める番だ。エンフォーサーを解散させろとか、武器をよこせとか、そんなことは言わないでくれ。そんなもの、俺達には必要ないんだ」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Hört doch auf uns, Alte Oma. Die drei Clans von Depot 4 sollten vereint handeln. Wir haben uns entschieden, nun müsst Ihr das tun. Fordert nicht, dass sie die Enforcers auflösen oder uns Waffen geben — das brauchen wir nicht."
languages.original_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the enforcers or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."

traits.locale_text: "Hört doch auf uns, Alte Oma. Die drei Clans von Depot 4 sollten vereint handeln. Wir haben uns entschieden, nun müsst Ihr das tun. Fordert nicht, dass sie die Enforcers auflösen oder uns Waffen geben — das brauchen wir nicht."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: « Il a raison, l'Ancêtre. Les trois clans du dépôt 4 doivent faire front commun. Notre décision est prise, la balle est dans ton camp. Oublie cette histoire d'armes et de service d'ordre, on en demande pas tant. »
languages.original_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the enforcers or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."

traits.locale_text: « Il a raison, l'Ancêtre. Les trois clans du dépôt 4 doivent faire front commun. Notre décision est prise, la balle est dans ton camp. Oublie cette histoire d'armes et de service d'ordre, on en demande pas tant. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Kulak as Nine. 4. Depo'nun üç klanı da birlikte hareket etmelidir. Biz kararımızı verdik, sıra sende. İnfazcıları terhis etmelerini ya da bize silah vermelerini isteme. Buna lüzum yok."
languages.original_text: "Listen to us, Old Nan. The three clans of Depot 4 ought to act as one. We've made our minds up, it's your turn to decide. Don't ask them to disband the enforcers or give us weapons — we don't need any of that."

traits.locale_text: "Kulak as ihtiyar. Depo 4'ün üç klanı birlikte hareket etmelidir. Biz kararımızı verdik, sıra sende. İnfazcıları terhis etmelerini ya da bize silah vermelerini isteme. Buna lüzum yok."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong
